details.FormattedPurpose: Kok til kinesisk restaurant seges! Kok til kinesisk restaurant soges! / Chef for Chinese restaurant in demand! Leder du efter et job, hvor der hele tiden er gang i den, men hvor du samtidig har friheden til at satte dit eget prag?Restaurant Soger lige nu en kok, der kan tiltrade hurtigst muligt. Vi er en kinesisk restaurant, der laver a la carte pa menuen. Om jobbet:- Have det overordnede ansvar i kokkenet- Forberedelse af maden til a la carte og take away- Planlagge menu- kokken og kan holde hovedet koldt under pres.- Imodekommende. - Kan arbejde bade i can start with ime late efect. note be. at we. Me are edine son serio no the kitchen.- Prepare the food for the a la carte and take away.- Plan the menu.- Plan the work schedule for your team, assigning work to colleagues, etc. Qualifications:- Educa- ted chef with experience for at least 5 years. - Kitchen skills.- Used to work in a kitchen and being able to cope with pressure.- Open-minded.- Able to work for several hours in weekdays and weekend.- Can speak either Danish, English or preferably Mandarin Chin- ese. * The position is for 37 hours per week. If you're interested, feel free to send an ap- plication and CV @gmail.com We're looking forward to hearing from you! Der er 1 le- dig stilling Der er 1 ledig stilling         回复转发   添加回应
